member.name: P:QCovid.RiskCalculator.BodyMassIndex.Bmi.BodyMassIndex

member.summary: Create an instance of the bmi class from a weight in kg and a height in centimetres

member.name: T:QCovid.RiskCalculator.CodeMapping.CodeType
member.summary: A class-based "enum" for types of medical codes, e.g. Read2

member.name: F:QCovid.RiskCalculator.CodeMapping.CodeType.Opcs
member.summary: Codes from the OPCS Classification of Interventions and Procedures

member.summary: Codes from the International Classification of Diseases, 10th revision

member.summary: Codes from the Dictionary of medicines and devices

member.name: P:QCovid.RiskCalculator.CodeMapping.CodeType.Value
member.summary: The enum value of a code type

member.name: T:QCovid.RiskCalculator.CodeMapping.IMedicalCodesToRiskInputConverter
member.summary: Converts a list of medical codes into a format that understands.
Create a from a list of medical codes and some additional settings.

member.name: T:QCovid.RiskCalculator.CodeMapping.MedicalCodeInstance
member.summary: A code representing something about a patient at a specified date, e.g. a medical condition, prior treatment or drug prescription

member.name: P:QCovid.RiskCalculator.CodeMapping.MedicalCodeInstance.CodeType
member.summary: The code type, e.g. SNOMED or Read2

member.name: P:QCovid.RiskCalculator.CodeMapping.MedicalCodeInstance.Date
member.summary: The date the code was recorded against the patient

member.name: P:QCovid.RiskCalculator.CodeMapping.MedicalCodeMappingResult.RiskInput
member.summary: The Risk Input resulting from the provided medical codes

member.name: P:QCovid.RiskCalculator.CodeMapping.MedicalCodeMappingResult.RecognisedMedicalCodes
member.summary: The list of the medical code instances which were understood by the mapper. This includes medical codes that were outdated, or overridden by others

member.name: P:QCovid.RiskCalculator.CodeMapping.MedicalCodeMappingResult.UnrecognisedMedicalCodes
member.summary: The list of medical code instances which were not understood by the mapper. This includes both medical codes which were malformed and medical codes which were irrelevant

member.name: P:QCovid.RiskCalculator.CodeMapping.MedicalCodeMappingResult.ErrorCodes
member.summary: A list of errors associated with this result.

member.name: T:QCovid.RiskCalculator.CodeMapping.MedicalCodesToRiskInputConverter
member.summary: Implements by checking the provided codes against the medical codes sql database and performing additional logic to determine which codes are in date and have priority

member.summary: Construct a CodesToInputConverter with a function to create a new database connection. Will close created db connection on dispose.

member.summary: Construct a CodesToInputConverter with a pre-existing database connection. Will not close db connection on dispose.

member.name: T:QCovid.RiskCalculator.Exceptions.LicenceKeyException
member.summary: An exception due to an unlicensed or expired release version of the QCovidRiskCalculator library.

member.name: T:QCovid.RiskCalculator.Exceptions.QCovidErrorCode
member.summary: A code representing an exception returned by a QCovid operation.

member.name: P:QCovid.RiskCalculator.Exceptions.QCovidErrorCode.Code
member.summary: A unique id for this error type.

member.name: P:QCovid.RiskCalculator.Exceptions.QCovidErrorCode.IsFatal
member.summary: Whether the error means no valid result could be returned.

member.name: P:QCovid.RiskCalculator.Exceptions.QCovidErrorCode.Message
member.summary: A human readable message associated with this error code.

member.name: F:QCovid.RiskCalculator.Exceptions.QCovidErrorCode.AgeBelowMinimumValue
member.summary: The provided age in years is below the calculators range

member.name: F:QCovid.RiskCalculator.Exceptions.QCovidErrorCode.AgeAboveMaximumValue
member.summary: The provided age in years is above the calculators range

member.name: F:QCovid.RiskCalculator.Exceptions.QCovidErrorCode.BmiBelowMinimumValue
member.summary: The provided BMI is below the calculators range. The minimum valid BMI will be used instead

member.name: F:QCovid.RiskCalculator.Exceptions.QCovidErrorCode.BmiAboveMaximumValue
member.summary: The provided BMI is above the calculators range. The maximum valid BMI will be used instead

member.name: F:QCovid.RiskCalculator.Exceptions.QCovidErrorCode.BmiNotProvided
member.summary: No BMI was provided. A default BMI will be used

member.name: F:QCovid.RiskCalculator.Exceptions.QCovidErrorCode.BmiIsNaN
member.summary: The provided BMI was not a number. A default BMI will be used

member.name: F:QCovid.RiskCalculator.Exceptions.QCovidErrorCode.NullInput
member.summary: One or more inputs is null

member.name: F:QCovid.RiskCalculator.Exceptions.QCovidErrorCode.PostcodeNotFound
member.summary: The provided postcode was not found

member.name: F:QCovid.RiskCalculator.Exceptions.QCovidErrorCode.CouldNotConnectToTownsendDatabase
member.summary: Could not open a connection to the Townsend database

member.name: F:QCovid.RiskCalculator.Exceptions.QCovidErrorCode.CouldNotQueryTownsendDatabase
member.summary: An error occurred while querying the Townsend database

member.name: F:QCovid.RiskCalculator.Exceptions.QCovidErrorCode.IncorrectTownsendDatabaseVersion
member.summary: The Townsend database did not pass the version check

member.name: F:QCovid.RiskCalculator.Exceptions.QCovidErrorCode.CouldNotConnectToMedicalCodeDatabase
member.summary: Could not open a connection to the Medical code database

member.name: F:QCovid.RiskCalculator.Exceptions.QCovidErrorCode.CouldNotQueryMedicalCodeDatabase
member.summary: An error occurred while querying the Medical code database

member.name: F:QCovid.RiskCalculator.Exceptions.QCovidErrorCode.IncorrectMedicalCodeDatabaseVersion
member.summary: The Medical code database did not pass the version check

member.name: M:QCovid.RiskCalculator.Exceptions.QCovidErrorCode.ToExceptionIfFatal
member.summary: For a fatal error code, returns a throw-able exception. Returns null otherwise

member.name: M:QCovid.RiskCalculator.Risk.Input.Age.CreateFromDateOfBirth(QCovid.RiskCalculator.Risk.Input.Date,QCovid.RiskCalculator.Risk.Input.Date)
member.summary: Get a users age from their date of birth and a specified current date.
member.remarks: Assumes users follow the western idea of age, e.g. not East Asian age reckoning. Assumes users born on February 29 consider their birthday to be March 1 in non-leap years.

member.name: T:QCovid.RiskCalculator.Risk.Input.CancerTreatmentsAndImmunoSuppressants
member.summary: Inputs representing various cancer treatments or medication effecting the immune system

member.name: P:QCovid.RiskCalculator.Risk.Input.CancerTreatmentsAndImmunoSuppressants.ChemotherapyGroup
member.summary: Have you had chemotherapy in the last 12 months? Chemotherapy prescribed in preceding 12 months as recorded on the Systemic Anti Cancer Treatment (SACT) data.

member.name: P:QCovid.RiskCalculator.Risk.Input.CancerTreatmentsAndImmunoSuppressants.RadioTherapyInLast6Months
member.summary: Have you had radiotherapy in the last 6 months?

member.name: P:QCovid.RiskCalculator.Risk.Input.CancerTreatmentsAndImmunoSuppressants.BoneMarrowTransplantInLast6Months
member.summary: Have you had a bone marrow or stem cell transplant in the last 6 months?

member.name: P:QCovid.RiskCalculator.Risk.Input.CancerTreatmentsAndImmunoSuppressants.CancerOfBloodOrBoneMarrow
member.summary: Have you a cancer of the blood or bone marrow such as leukaemia, myelodysplastic syndromes, lymphoma or myeloma and are at any stage of treatment?

member.name: P:QCovid.RiskCalculator.Risk.Input.CancerTreatmentsAndImmunoSuppressants.SolidOrganTransplant
member.summary: Have you had a solid organ transplant (lung, liver, stomach, pancreas, spleen, heart or thymus)?

member.name: P:QCovid.RiskCalculator.Risk.Input.CancerTreatmentsAndImmunoSuppressants.PrescribedImmunoSuppressants
member.summary: Have you been prescribed immunosuppressants prescribed by your GP? Prescribed four or more times in the previous 6 months.

member.name: P:QCovid.RiskCalculator.Risk.Input.CancerTreatmentsAndImmunoSuppressants.PrescribedOralSteroids
member.summary: Have you been prescribed oral steroids by your GP in the last 6 months? Oral prednisolone containing preparations prescribed four or more times in the previous 6 months.

member.name: T:QCovid.RiskCalculator.Risk.Input.ChemotherapyGroup
member.summary: An input representing classifications of Chemotherapy treatment

member.name: F:QCovid.RiskCalculator.Risk.Input.ChemotherapyGroup.NoneInLast12Months
member.summary: No Chemotherapy in the last 12 months

member.name: M:QCovid.RiskCalculator.Risk.Input.ChemotherapyGroup.GetAllOptions
member.summary: Get all available Chemotherapy Groups in order of ascending severity

member.name: T:QCovid.RiskCalculator.Risk.Input.ChemotherapyItem
member.summary: An input representing a specific chemotherapy treatment

member.name: M:QCovid.RiskCalculator.Risk.Input.ChemotherapyItem.GetGroupFromTreatmentList(System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{QCovid.RiskCalculator.Risk.Input.ChemotherapyItem})
member.summary: Get the corresponding Chemotherapy Group from a list of Chemotherapy Items taken in the last 12 months. An empty list will return the NoneInLast12Months group.

member.name: M:QCovid.RiskCalculator.Risk.Input.ChemotherapyItem.GetAllOptions
member.summary: Get all available Chemotherapy Items in alphabetical order

member.name: T:QCovid.RiskCalculator.Risk.Input.ChronicKidneyDisease
member.summary: A classification of Chronic Kidney Disease

member.summary: CKD5 with dialysis in the last 12 months

member.name: M:QCovid.RiskCalculator.Risk.Input.ChronicKidneyDisease.GetAllOptions
member.summary: Get all available Chronic Kidney Disease options in order of ascending severity

member.name: T:QCovid.RiskCalculator.Risk.Input.ClinicalInformation
member.summary: A collection on inputs about various relevant diseases, conditions and treatments

member.name: P:QCovid.RiskCalculator.Risk.Input.ClinicalInformation.SickleCellOrSevereCombinedImmunodeficiencySyndrome
member.summary: Do you have sickle cell disease or severe combined immune deficiency syndromes?

member.name: P:QCovid.RiskCalculator.Risk.Input.ClinicalInformation.SickleCellOrSevereCombinedImmunodeficiencySyndromeViaBool
member.summary: This is a convenience that can be used in place of SickleCellOrSevereCombinedImmunodeficiencySyndrome since there are only two options for that

member.name: P:QCovid.RiskCalculator.Risk.Input.ClinicalInformation.LearningDisabilityOrDownsSyndrome
member.summary: Do you have a learning disability or Down's Syndrome? The most recently recorded value. If someone has a code both for learning disability and Downs, they should be coded as Downs.

member.name: P:QCovid.RiskCalculator.Risk.Input.ClinicalInformation.CancerTreatmentsAndImmunoSuppressants
member.summary: Have you had any cancer treatments or are you taking any immuno-suppressants?

member.name: P:QCovid.RiskCalculator.Risk.Input.ClinicalInformation.RespiratoryProblems
member.summary: Do you have any respiratory problems?

member.name: P:QCovid.RiskCalculator.Risk.Input.ClinicalInformation.HeartOrCirculationProblems
member.summary: Do you have any heart or circulation problems?

member.name: P:QCovid.RiskCalculator.Risk.Input.ClinicalInformation.NeurologicalProblems
member.summary: Do you have any neurological problems?

member.name: P:QCovid.RiskCalculator.Risk.Input.ClinicalInformation.OtherConditions
member.summary: Do you have any of these other conditions?

member.name: T:QCovid.RiskCalculator.Risk.Input.Date
member.summary: Holds a Date only, no time

member.name: P:QCovid.RiskCalculator.Risk.Input.Date.Value
member.summary: This date as a standard instance

member.name: M:QCovid.RiskCalculator.Risk.Input.Date.#ctor(System.DateTime)
member.summary: Strips the time off a DateTime and records only the Date part of it

member.name: M:QCovid.RiskCalculator.Risk.Input.Diabetes.GetAllOptions
member.summary: Get all available Diabetes options in order of ascending severity

member.name: F:QCovid.RiskCalculator.Risk.Input.Ethnicity.NotRecorded
member.summary: Not recorded. This option is only for bulk calculations from a patient database. If performing a calculation for a single individual via a UI, this option should not be included.

member.name: F:QCovid.RiskCalculator.Risk.Input.Ethnicity.OtherMixedOrMultiEthnic
member.summary: Other mixed or multiple ethnic background

member.name: M:QCovid.RiskCalculator.Risk.Input.Ethnicity.GetAllOptions
member.summary: Get all available Ethnicity options in a set order. Excludes Not Recorded as it should not be shown on UIs.

member.name: M:QCovid.RiskCalculator.Risk.Input.Ethnicity.GetAllOptionsForBulkCalculation
member.summary: Get all available Ethnicity options in a set order, including Not Recorded.

member.name: T:QCovid.RiskCalculator.Risk.Input.HeartOrCirculationProblems
member.summary: Inputs representing various heart or circulation problems

member.name: P:QCovid.RiskCalculator.Risk.Input.HeartOrCirculationProblems.CongenitalHeartProblem
member.summary: Do you have congenital heart disease or have you had surgery for it in the past?

member.name: P:QCovid.RiskCalculator.Risk.Input.HeartOrCirculationProblems.CoronaryHeartDisease
member.summary: Do you have coronary heart disease?

member.summary: Have you had a stroke or TIA?

member.summary: Do you have peripheral vascular disease?

member.name: P:QCovid.RiskCalculator.Risk.Input.HeartOrCirculationProblems.ThrombosisOrPulmonaryEmbolus
member.summary: Have you had a thrombosis or pulmonary embolus?

member.summary: Classifications of a patient's current housing situations

member.summary: Get all available housing categories in order of ascending severity

member.summary: An interface for an enum like input option

member.name: P:QCovid.RiskCalculator.Risk.Input.IInputOption.Index
member.summary: An index number for this option. Does not map to an internal representation or display sort order, but is unique for this option type and will remain consistent between versions.

member.summary: An Input that can be ordered by severity

member.summary: Get all Learning Disability Or Downs Syndrome options in order of ascending severity

member.summary: Do you have motor neurone disease, multiple sclerosis, myaesthenia, or Huntington's Chorea?

member.name: T:QCovid.RiskCalculator.Risk.Input.OtherConditions
member.summary: Inputs representing various conditions not covered otherwise

member.name: P:QCovid.RiskCalculator.Risk.Input.OtherConditions.SevereMentalIllness
member.summary: Do you have severe mental illness?

member.name: P:QCovid.RiskCalculator.Risk.Input.OtherConditions.LiverCirrhosis
member.summary: Do you have cirrhosis of the liver?

member.name: P:QCovid.RiskCalculator.Risk.Input.OtherConditions.RheumatoidArthritisOrSle
member.summary: Do you have rheumatoid arthritis or SLE?

member.name: P:QCovid.RiskCalculator.Risk.Input.OtherConditions.PriorFractureOfHipWristSpineHumerus
member.summary: Have you had a prior fracture of hip, wrist, spine or humerus?

member.name: P:QCovid.RiskCalculator.Risk.Input.RespiratoryProblems.TakingAntiLeukotrieneOrLaba
member.summary: Are you taking anti-leukotriene or long acting beta2-agonists (LABA)? Prescribed four or more times in the previous 6 months.

member.name: P:QCovid.RiskCalculator.Risk.Input.RespiratoryProblems.CysticFibrosisBronchiectasisAlveolitis
member.summary: Do you have cystic fibrosis or bronchiectasis or alveolitis?

member.name: P:QCovid.RiskCalculator.Risk.Input.RespiratoryProblems.PulmonaryHypertensionOrFibrosis
member.summary: Do you have pulmonary hypertension or pulmonary fibrosis?

member.name: P:QCovid.RiskCalculator.Risk.Input.RespiratoryProblems.Copd
member.summary: Do you have chronic obstructive pulmonary disease (COPD)?

member.name: P:QCovid.RiskCalculator.Risk.Input.RespiratoryProblems.LungOrOralCancer
member.summary: Do you have lung or oral cancer?

member.name: P:QCovid.RiskCalculator.Risk.Input.RiskInput.Age
member.summary: The age of the patient in years at the date of calculation.

member.name: P:QCovid.RiskCalculator.Risk.Input.RiskInput.Bmi
member.summary: Body Mass Index. The most recently recorded patient BMI within the last 5 years.

member.name: P:QCovid.RiskCalculator.Risk.Input.RiskInput.Sex
member.summary: The sex of the patient. This is usually biological sex at birth. There is insufficient data to model those who are intersex or trans, or indeed what the long term effect of hormone treatment etc on COVID risk for those who are biologically reassigned.

member.name: P:QCovid.RiskCalculator.Risk.Input.RiskInput.EncryptedTownsendScore
member.summary: The Townsend score for the patient's residence.

member.name: P:QCovid.RiskCalculator.Risk.Input.RiskInput.HousingCategory
member.summary: What is your housing category - care home or homeless or neither? The most recently recorded accommodation status recorded on GP record.

member.name: T:QCovid.RiskCalculator.Risk.Input.SickleCellOrSevereCombinedImmunodeficiencySyndrome
member.summary: Whether a person has Sickle Cell Or Severe Combined Immunodeficiency Syndrome

member.name: M:QCovid.RiskCalculator.Risk.Input.SickleCellOrSevereCombinedImmunodeficiencySyndrome.GetAllOptions
member.summary: Get all available Sickle Cell Or Severe Combined Immunodeficiency Syndrome options in order of ascending severity

member.summary: Calculates the QCovid risk report for the patient

member.summary: A list of error codes associated with this result.

member.name: P:QCovid.RiskCalculator.Risk.Result.IRiskResult.Input
member.summary: The inputs supplied to the calculation method

member.name: P:QCovid.RiskCalculator.Risk.Result.IRiskResult.ResultForTypicalPersonSameAgeSex
member.summary: Results for the a person with the same age and sex and the patient but without the risk factors

member.name: P:QCovid.RiskCalculator.Risk.Result.RiskResult.Input
member.summary: The inputs supplied to the calculation method

member.name: P:QCovid.RiskCalculator.Risk.Result.RiskResult.ResultForTypicalPersonSameAgeSex
member.summary: Results for the a person with the same age and sex and the patient but without the risk factors

member.name: P:QCovid.RiskCalculator.Risk.Result.RiskResult.ErrorCodes
member.summary: A list of error codes associated with this result.

member.name: T:QCovid.RiskCalculator.Risk.Result.RiskResultForOutcomeType
member.summary: The probability of outcome (e.g. catching COVID-19 and dying) during a 90 day period and the percentile ranking of that risk

member.name: P:QCovid.RiskCalculator.Risk.Result.RiskResultForOutcomeType.RiskPercentage
member.summary: The probability of outcome (e.g. catching COVID-19 and dying) during a 90 day period. This is expressed as a percentage (rather than as a fraction)

member.name: P:QCovid.RiskCalculator.Risk.Result.RiskResultForOutcomeType.Centile
member.summary: The percentile ranking of the risk, i.e. if we put the whole population in a line, ranked according to their risk, and then divide this line into 100 equally sized groups, in which group does the subject lie. The highest risk is the 100th centile.

member.name: M:QCovid.RiskCalculator.Risk.Result.RiskResultForOutcomeType.#ctor(System.Double,System.Int32)
member.summary: Construct the result from the risk percentage and the centile

member.name: T:QCovid.RiskCalculator.Risk.Result.RiskResultForSubjectType
member.summary: The risk results for a given subject

member.name: P:QCovid.RiskCalculator.Risk.Result.RiskResultForSubjectType.Death
member.summary: Results for catching COVID-19 and dying as a result

member.name: P:QCovid.RiskCalculator.Risk.Result.RiskResultForSubjectType.Hospitalisation
member.summary: Results for catching COVID-19 and being admitted into hospital as a result

member.summary: Get the range of valid ages, in years

member.summary: Get the range of valid dates-of-birth, given the current time

member.summary: Get the range of valid body mass indexes

member.summary: A range of valid inputs of type

member.name: T:QCovid.RiskCalculator.Townsend.EncryptedTownsendScore
member.summary: An encrypted version of the Townsend score, plus any error code present from the lookup in the encrypted database. For demonstration purposes, in the open source version this is a thin wrapper around the score with no encryption provided.

member.name: P:QCovid.RiskCalculator.Townsend.EncryptedTownsendScore.Value
member.summary: The value of the encrypted score or null if the default score is to be used.

member.name: P:QCovid.RiskCalculator.Townsend.EncryptedTownsendScore.ErrorCode

member.summary: For the open source version, this constructor has been made public.

member.summary: Use this instance to represent the default Townsend score

member.summary: Takes a postcode and returns an encrypted Townsend score instance based on the content of an encrypted database

member.summary: Looks up a value (the transformed Townsend score) by key (the postcode hash)

member.name: P:QCovid.RiskCalculator.Townsend.Postcode.PostcodeString
member.summary: The postcode, converted to all-caps with no white-space.
